thread.title_full: Kiša i prebrza vožnja u kombinaciji doveli do nove nesreće – 61-godišnji pješak u Vojniću zadobio ozljede opasne po život

posts.author: KAportal
posts.title: Kiša i prebrza vožnja u kombinaciji doveli do nove nesreće – 61-godišnji pješak u Vojniću zadobio ozljede opasne po život
posts.text:
CRNA KRONIKA Ostavite komentar foto ilustracija 
Novi nalet na pješaka dogodio se jučer u 10.30 sati na državnoj cesti D-6 u Vojniću. Teško je ozlijeđen 61-godišnjak koji se kretao uz lijevi rub kolnika u suprotnom smjeru i to s ozljedama opasnim po život pa liječnici čine sve da nesretni Vojnićanin preživi posljedice udara. 
– Osobnim automobilom karlovačkih registarskih oznaka upravljao je 57-godišnjak koji je zbog neprilagođene brzine i atmosferskih prilika, po kiši, izgubio nadzor nad upravljačem te udario u pješaka, kažu u policiji. Tom prilikom 61-godišnjak je teško ozlijeđen, a ozljede su opasne po život. 
– Nadležnom državnom odvjetništvu protiv 57-godišnjeg vozača bit će proslijeđena kaznena prijava, dodaju u policiji. 
To je treći nalet na pješaka u nepunih desetak dana. Podsjetimo, crni niz započeo je upravo kod Vojnića, u mjestu Krstinja gdje je automobil naletio mladića i također mu nanio ozljede opasne po život. Prije par dana tragično je poginuo 66-godišnjak kod Josipdola, a sad se dogodilo i ovo u Vojniću. 
KAportal.hr

posts.author: dodo
posts.title: 골덴스커트
posts.text:
​ ​ ​얇은 골지모양의 골덴 스커트에요. H라인으로 적당히 여유있는 라인이에 허리는 밴딩으로 되어 있어 사이즈 구애 없이 입을수 있는 사이즈구요.
무릎을 훌쩍 덮는 기장에 앞쪽에 트임이 있어 포인트 되면서 걷는데 불편없이 입으실수 있어요.
어디든 매치하기 쉬어 겨울철 니트나 맨투맨등에 두루 코디하기 좋으실꺼에요
총장77 허리단면33 힙단면43 트임27
도도언니
height:161 body:55 bottom:27
 ​ https://story.kakao.com/ch/dodo2962 카 카오 채 널 에 소식 받기 하시면 도도의 신상을 빠르게 받아보실수 있으세요^^
​
1.배송 ﻿
-7만원 이상 주문시 배송비는 무료이며 7만원 이하 주문시 배송비 2500원이 추가 됩니다.
-평균 배송일은 2~7일이며 거래처 사정상 리오더가 들어가는 상품은 배송이 많이 지연 될수 있으니 이점 양해 부탁 드려요^^
-매장에 수량을 넉넉히 가지고 있는게 아니라
고객님 주문과 동시에 거래처 주문이 들어가기 때문에 주문 주신 상품은 다른 상품으로
교환,환불 불가합니다.
-사이즈나 색상변경은 1회에 가능하며 배송비 2500원은 고객님이 부담 하셔야 합니다. 2.상품문의
-가격이나 상품 문의는 비밀댓글 이나 카톡 ms1463 으로 주심 친절히 답변 해드릴께요.
​ -카드결제와 현금결제의 가격은 다릅니다.
-카드 결제는 http://storefarm.naver.com/dodo296
dodo : 네이버쇼핑 스토어팜 세련되고 모던한 미시룩 storefarm.naver.com 여기서 네이버페이로 결제 가능합니다^^
3.주문방법
현금결제시
계좌번호:우리은행1002-943-891-344 조유*로 입금해주시신후 댓글또는
 카카오톡으로 ms1463 보내주시면 결제확인후 주문이 들어갑니다.

thread.title_full: حریرچی: درمان معتادان، تخصص وزارت بهداشت است

posts.title: حریرچی: درمان معتادان، تخصص وزارت بهداشت است
posts.text:
بزرگنمایی متن خبر حریرچی: درمان معتادان، تخصص وزارت بهداشت است قائم مقام وزیر بهداشت با بیان اینکه درمان بیولوژیک و روانشناختی معتادان، تخصص وزارت بهداشت است، گفت: درمان اختلالات مصرف مواد با داروهای آگونیست با هدف درمان بیماران و بخصوص درمان با متادون با هدف کاهش آسیب صورت می‌پذیرد و حمایت‌های اجتماعی نیز چرخه درمان را کامل می‌کند. 
دکتر ایرج حریرچی در گفت‌وگو با ایسنا، درخصوص رویکرد وزارت بهداشت در حوزه اعتیاد، گفت: در حوزه کاهش تقاضای اعتیاد دو سیاست کلی داریم که شامل سیاست پرهیزمدار است با هدف توقف مصرف مواد و دوم کاهش آسیب و درمان معتادان با داروهای آگونیست از جمله متادون و بوپرنورفین که در این سیاست بیمار ممکن است برای مدت‌های طولانی به جای ماده مخدر غیر قانونی یک داروی آگونیست را با کمک و راهنمایی درمانگر آموزش دیده مصرف کند و این درمان دارویی در کنار سایر درمان‌های غیر دارویی و روانشناخی، بیمار را به زندگی عادی بازمی‌گرداند. 
وی افزود: رویکرد کاهش آسیب‌ از طریق درمان با متادون از سال ۸۱ شروع شده است و درمان با متادون باعث کاهش مواد افیونی غیرقانونی، کاهش تزریق مشترک، کاهش پرخاشگری و بهتر شدن وضعیت خلقی اجتماعی افراد، کاهش بروز اچ آی وی و هپاتیت‌ها می‌شود. سخنگوی وزارت بهداشت افزود: در رویکرد کاهش آسیب تلاش این است که اعتیاد تزریقی و پرخطر به جایگزینی آن با داروها تغییر یابد و با استفاده از داروهای متادون و بوپرنورفین و... اعتیاد آنها را کنترل کنیم. سخنگوی وزارت بهداشت گفت: هم اکنون ۷۰۰ هزار نفر در مراکز کاهش آسیب و درمان اعتیاد تحت پوشش برنامه درمان و کاهش آسیب اعتیاد هستند و حدود هفت هزار مرکز تخصصی در کشور فعال است که عمده آنها در بخش خصوصی هستند. قائم مقام وزیر بهداشت ادامه داد: وقتی کسی سابقه مصرف طولانی مواد داشته باشد، بعد از ترک آن، از طرف جامعه به راحتی پذیرفته نمی‌شود. این فرد اعتبار، روابط اجتماعی، شغل خود و خانواده را در جامعه از دست داده‌ است؛ به همین دلیل در این مرحله باید دستگاه‌های حمایتی هماهنگ عمل کنند. وی ادامه داد: ستاد مبارزه با مواد مخدر مصوب کرده که مدیریت برنامه درمان اختلالات مصرف مواد بر بستر الکترونیک استوار شود و امکان ثبت اطلاعات مراکز درمانی بیماران (با حفظ محرمانگی اطلاعات بیمار) و رهگیری داروهای مصرفی در مراکز درمانی فراهم باشد. در این راستا سامانه‌ای موسوم به آیداتیس در سرورهای ستاد مرکزی وزارتخانه راه‌اندازی شده است. به گفته سخنگوی وزارت بهداشت، هم اکنون مشخصات حدود ۶۸۴ هزار و ۸۱۸ معتاد در این سامانه ثبت شده است و تا سه هفته آینده پوشش ثبت معتادان در این سامانه کامل می شود. این سامانه از کدهای حفاظتی لازم برخوردار است. وی تصریح کرد: تا کنون پرونده درمان ۵۷۸ هزار و ۱۶۰ نفر تکمیل و برای بیش از ۵۰۳ هزار و ۶۸۹ نفر از طریق این سامانه دارو تجویز شده است. از این رقم ۴۷۲ هزار نفر از طریق همین سامانه داروی خود را تحویل گرفتند و تا چند هفته آینده نیز پوشش آیداتیس در شهرهای مختلف کامل می‌شود. 
حریرچی در پایان خاطرنشان کرد: هدف از کاهش آسیب معتادان بازگرداندن آنها به زندگی عادی است تا از رفتارهای خشونت آمیز آنها نیز پیشگیری شود، این برنامه از ۱۷ سال پیش در کشور در حال اجراست از نظر کاهش ایدز و هپاتیت در بین معتادان موفق بوده‌ایم.

posts.author: Namethecat
posts.text: I can understand your worry, but that really is all it is. You don't say if you are single and will be doing this alone but I'll assume you are. Your employer has obviously seen a great potential in you and has given you the opportunity to improve your career and therefore lifestyle. As long as you are not moving to a massively expensive area you will be able to afford a better home (tick) You will meet new people,with new interests,in a new area (tick) your weekends will give you the opportunity of seeing / visiting new places (tick) and in a funny way being somewhat forced into doing this will prove to you that you are a strong,brave person who can take on the world ! (tick,tick,tick )

posts.author: KAportal
posts.title: Za novi most Hrnetić – Velika Jelsa, Grad Karlovac diže 10 milijuna kuna kredita – gradnja planirana u 2018.
posts.text:
KARLOVAC 5 komentara 
Među najvažnijim infrastrukturnim projektima čiju realizaciju, po najavi gradonačelnika, Grad Karlovac planira u 2018. godini je i most Hrnetić – Velika Jelsa. Gradnja bi trebala stajati oko 10 milijuna kuna, do kojih će Grad, navedeno je u nacrtu proračuna za iduću godinu, doći kreditom. 
Most je zbog sigurnosti prije nekoliko mjeseci zatvoren za promet, njime idu samo pješaci i biciklisti, no ne bi još dugo trebalo biti tako. 
– U veljači 2018. godine bit će gotova potrebna dokumentacija, a nakon toga kreće se u realizaciju projekta. Izgradnja kompletnog novog mosta stajala bi 36 milijuna kuna, a mosta na postojećim babicama, koje su stručnjaci provjerili i utvrdili da mogu ostati, 10 milijuna kuna. Definitivno idemo u ovaj projekt, a financijsku konstrukciju zatvorit ćemo i kreditnim sredstvima, rekao je gradonačelnik Damir Mandić. 
KAportal.hr

thread.title: 高中生畢業
thread.title_full: 高中生畢業 - Dcard

posts.author: 義守大學
posts.title: 高中生畢業
posts.text:
我分享一下我的經驗~

今年剛畢業，第一份工作是作業員，做兩個禮拜就離職了，原因有很多，除了自己不喜歡外，還有就是當時的公司開始產線自動化，雖然不會那麼快輪到我的站點，但是如果真的到了之後，再出去找工作履歷上要怎麼寫?說白點，作業員沒專業，隨便一個人都可以取代掉，大學畢業當作業員，做久是比較有機會升領班，不用待產線，但還是要輪班，所以我就直接提離職了

現在的工作這個月剛滿3個月，是電子科技業的業務助理，雖然薪水不比作業員高，但我做的很快樂，也學到很多東西，我們老闆也很鼓勵新人多學多做，所以我剛到職第一個月就幫老闆到國外出差了，也跟著老闆國內外到處跑，到處跟客戶開會，比起之前的工作，現在做得很開心也學到很多

我當初第一份跟第二份工作間隔一段時間，因為真的很不喜歡作業員工作，所以一下子就提離職，家人還蠻不諒解的，會覺得真的有到要那麼快離職嗎?可以等到有新工作再遞辭呈就好，所以我是建議有工作再離職

thread.title: To be scared about my next movements?
thread.title_full: To be scared about my next movements? | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: momentsofconstrictedlives
posts.title: To be scared about my next movements?
posts.text:
I was offered a promoted position in my workplace last month, some 200 miles away from where I live.
Obviously, I am pleased to have a much better job and feel I am moving forwards in my career and life generally (things have rather stagnated over the last two years or so and I found myself in a bit of a rut.)
But I am also feeling a sense of anxiousness and worry that's really hard to shift. I'm worried about knowing no one at all. I have a horrible feeling that since my friends are married and have children the onus will obviously be on me to keep visiting in order to maintain the friendships and this can get difficult. I'm worried about seemingly small things such as finding somewhere to live (!) and immersing myself into a new life.
Has anyone done this and found it worked out for the best? I'm low on confidence at the moment!

thread.title: To be scared about my next movements?
thread.title_full: To be scared about my next movements? | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: Jamboree05
posts.text:
We did this. I'm not going to say it's easy, and I was moving with my partner so not complete alone, buy it is all very doable.
RE somewhere to live. If you are looking to buy, I would seriously rent for 6 months first and get to know the surrounding areas. Then look for somewhere you would like to buy.
When you get there, immerse yourself in everything- actively look for new friends as it will get lonely otherwise. Ask workmates out for a drink, go to local exercise/hobby groups (whatever your into). It's a little exhausting but you'll make friends quickly and can then settle into more of a routine.
As for your friends at home, they will still be there and many might like the offer of a weekend away to visit you somewhere nice. I will say though, that I found out who my true friends were when we moved as there was certainly some who I felt couldn't be bothered at all...
I'm sure you know all this and you will be fine. Congratulations on your new job and enjoy your new venture!!

thread.title: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training
thread.title_full: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training - BabyCenter

posts.author: JCH22
posts.title: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training
posts.text:
I moved back to my hometown in July. My brother lives in the area and we decided he could live with us until “the end of October” when he re commits to this area or another area.
He’s in the Air Force reserves and is in the 2nd of a 5 year commitment. He has to stay in the reserves until the 5 years is up but once a year can request to be transferred to another base.
He has worked at a hotel since before we got here. He worked at a retail store as well. The hotel offered him full time if he quit the other job. He quit the other job and they NEVER gave him full time. (Promised this back in June).
My brother says he was very upfront about his AF (Aunt Flo - menstruation/period) training requirements with his job. They knew he’d have to leave town at times for training plus 1 weekend a month at the base.
Since July he has had to leave town for training for 2 weeks twice. I realize this is a lot of time off. The first time he had decent hours when he came back because one of the other employees was having trouble with the law (cops kept coming there looking for her).
That lasted a week and then his hours were significantly reduced. I told him that it seemed like they wanted him to quit and were pushing him out. Since then (late July) he has had 2 shifts a week - 16 hours. He has only been able to pay us rent once since living here.
He got back today from another 2 week trip. His manager asked him to come in tomorrow to talk. He said “sure” and asked for the schedule. She said it was about the schedule. I’m 99% sure they’re going to fire him tomorrow. Which I feel is illegal... but that’s another thing.
My question is: what jobs do reserve military have??? Do you have any ideas? My brother has been applying for jobs since we moved here, he really has been trying. The economy in our area is pretty good. I believe his reserve commitments are ruining opportunities for him. It’s so frustrating. I understand that a lot of places wouldn’t be able to give people 2 weeks off easily. When I was in a hiring position I wouldn’t have been able to hire someone with that schedule because we had like 5 total employees. But there are a lot of people in the reserves so I’m trying to figure out what the hell they do for a job?
Also, he lives in our baby room. I’m being induced in 29 days and I am freaking the F out that he has no place to go. I need to set up my baby room. Good lord... but I know I got myself into this by letting him live here so I can only blame myself.
Any suggestions appreciated

thread.title: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training
thread.title_full: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training - BabyCenter

posts.author: Babebump21
posts.text: I’m currently in the military now and it is illegal for your job to fire you will on training. As long as your brother gave his job documentation. By law they cannot do that and they can be sued.

thread.section_title: AIBU? | Mumsnet Discussion
thread.title: To be scared about my next movements?
thread.title_full: To be scared about my next movements? | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: wewentoutonsunday
posts.text:
I did this, but was a bit younger so most of my friends weren’t yet married, and we were already quite spread around.
I didn’t know a soul, and moved to a really small company. I did move into a house share, tbh, but that only lasted three months, then I moved on my own.
I found that accepting any invitations, going to lots of events, doing things by myself, all helped me make friends - even if some at the beginning did not last, they boosted my confidence and introduced me to people who still are my friends, over ten years later.
I am now married, kids, a good, wise circle of friends who I know well. Good luck!

http://mybs.in/2UaJA8Q ALSO READ Vedanta, Adani may bid for $9 bn Indian diamond project abandoned by Rio Surat ready to shine with global diamond exchange in 3 years Don't buy diamonds just for investing MCX applies for diamond futures trading, awaits Sebi approval Is GST on diamond processing an unintended gift to China? 
India's state-owned miner NMDC Ltd plans to bid for a $9 billion diamond project in Madhya Pradesh, three sources directly involved with the plan told Reuters, competing against resources conglomerates Adani and Vedanta. 
NMDC plans to shortly send a team to Bhopal for talks with state authorities, one of the sources said. 
"We initially wanted the central government to directly give us the mine through nomination but it was turned down," another of the sources said, adding that the government wanted the mine to be sold via auction due to the large amount of interest. 
The Bunder deposit, which is estimated to hold around 32 million carats of diamonds, was abandoned by global miner Rio Tinto earlier this year. 
The state government is likely to auction the deposits later this month following planned changes to the National Mineral Policy that could enable wider participation, a senior state government official said on condition of anonymity. 
The new policy is expected to lower the eligibility criteria for bidders on big projects, allowing bidders with a net worth of 2 percent of the value of a project's resources, down from 4 percent currently, according to a draft. 
"By Nov. 30, we will be issuing the notice inviting tender," Manohar Lal Dubey, Madhya Pradesh's top mineral resources official, told Reuters by phone. 
NMDC did not respond to a Reuters email seeking comments. 
RACE FOR DIAMONDS 
Rio spent about $90 million over 14 years on Bunder, located in a forested area important to tiger and wildlife habitats, but the project was hampered by delays in obtaining environmental permissions. 
Small teams from both Vedanta Resources , controlled by London-based Indian billionaire Anil Agarwal, and fellow billionaire Gautam Adani's Adani Group visited the site in recent months, three sources told Reuters last month. 
NMDC already mines diamonds in the neighbouring Majhgawan mine at Panna, Madhya Pradesh, where the company has extracted about 1 million carats of diamonds, according to information on the company's website. 
For the new round of bidding for Bunder, the Madhya Pradesh government has more than halved the mining area to 364 hectares (899 acres). 
Separately to the current bidding process, NMDC plans to explore the remaining 590 hectares of the mine area after seeking approval from the National Mineral Exploration Trust, the sources said. 
The environment ministry earlier this year gave an unofficial assurance of speedy forest clearance, the state government official said. 
"We have their in-principle approval that there will not be delays." 
The area is, according to the environment ministry, a corridor between the Panna Tiger Reserve and the Navardehi Wildlife Sanctuary and has seen protests from environmentalists. 
"The site is a protected forest not a reserve, so the density of trees isn't the way the activists are claiming it is," the official said.   13:39 IST

thread.title: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training
thread.title_full: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training - BabyCenter

posts.author: Anniegirl0409
posts.text:
If he is fired due to his military service, he needs to go speak with his units IG and let them know what happened. Also on a majority of military bases there are ACS and ACAP offices which can help him with the job search.
I agree with the prior posts that he should file for unemployment and tell them he was fired due to military service. He Dan look at the United States postal service, and Home Depot looks for veterans.

thread.title: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training
thread.title_full: OT: job ideas? Brother being fired because he went to military training - BabyCenter

posts.author: Goodgollyms
posts.text:
My husband is in the reserves and it definitely is illegal for them to fire or reduce hours because of military service conflicts.
My husband works at Lowe’s and they’re very accommodating with his military schedule. However, his immediate manager was giving him a ton of crap about being gone when he needed to so he took it to one of the higher ups and she ended up being written up for it. I also know that if he has to be gone for an unexpected reason that was not previously put in for time off (like when they activated him for the whole hurricane Harvey thing) he’s asked to provide a copy of his orders to verify that that is where is was.
I’d see if he could take it up a level if they’re jerking him around. Also, I’d suggest he makes sure any of those extended periods of absence can be traced on paper so that if they should try and fire him, he has the evidence he needs to prove his case.

thread.title: 高中生畢業
thread.title_full: 高中生畢業 - Dcard

posts.author: 開南大學
posts.text:
這是跟朋友借的帳號
我沒有讀大學就出社會了
文長，有點像流水帳，希望大家耐心看完
可能會覺得我不知所云，我自己也這麼覺得

當初，在學校得知政府有辦一個給我們這屆畢業生的一個計畫：青年就業領航計畫，這個計畫的期限是兩年或三年，可以選擇要工作的地方，有時間限制，到8月底沒有媒合成功，就只能放棄了
我會被這個計畫吸引的原因有二：
1.我不知道要工作還是唸大學
2.此計畫薪水25k，每個月再補助一萬
這條件真的很吸引我

所以我就參加了，後來畢業了，我去看職缺
天啊😱 幾乎是要輪班不然就是夜班
可以說是把沒有人要做的工作丟給我們
而且，有的都是要專業技能，應該是這樣
我看來看去，很少是我能勝任的
一個只有高中畢業的，只能做最基層的，就是作業員，我的感覺啦

6月份畢業，我上來桃園，之後就一直等，我有去面試，最後也是不了了之，我可以做的公司，也是沒有通知我，專員跟我說，我應徵的公司都徵滿了

後來8月，我跑去工作，職稱是品管，這是我的第一份工作
不得不說，我覺得輕鬆，坐著又可以吹冷氣
也不會辛苦，就檢查產品外觀有沒有瑕疵
8h周休，只是底薪21k，我了解到工作跟薪水是成正比的，剛開始很不習慣，初入社會
上班就是一直做一直做，跟在學校完全不一樣
雖輕鬆，但我做了一個禮拜就離職了

由於還沒8月底，我就寄望在計畫上，
還是一樣落空。

現在大學是基本學歷，因為我沒有興趣，望著大學的科系，我不知道自己要讀的是什麼，畢業了，才後悔沒有在學校多學一點，可以說是打混摸魚、低空飛過
出社會了，才發現沒有技能專長就只能付出勞力來賺錢

前一個禮拜，在洗衣廠做，但只做一天，很累
會計跑來問我還可以嗎，感覺我快不行了，做到今天就好還是要繼續做下去
我想了一下，說我做到今天就好
之後下班，會計跟我小聊了一下，她說，我還可以去唸大學，只有高中畢業，好的工作不會輪到我做

我知道自己還不安定也很迷惘，未來的路怎麼走我也不知道
我常常都是聽人家說，我就怎麼做

我現在做的工作是作業員，這應該也沒有不好
想問大家有人大學畢業也是做作業員嗎？

姑姑是希望我唸大學，她不希望我的人生就只有這樣，姑姑說大學只是一個歷程

我也不想半工半讀，不過現在大學的上課方式有很多
我應該可以選擇適合自己的，例如假日上課，一到五上班這樣

另外，想問大家，在職中找工作還是離職了再找，哪個比較好？

謝謝大家

thread.title_full: From cricket to leadership: Satya Nadella shares his life experience

posts.title: From cricket to leadership: Satya Nadella shares his life experience
posts.text:
Satya Nadella with his book 'Hit Refresh'. Photo: @satyanadella (Twitter) ALSO READ India can benefit a lot from AI in agriculture: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella Hit Refresh: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella on building partnerships Satya Nadella's word file Ola, Microsoft join hands to build connected platform for carmakers A democrat at heart, Satya Nadella reveals his love for test cricket 
On a whirlwind trip to India for the promotion of Hit Refresh , his book on his journey to becoming the chief executive of Microsoft, one of the world’s biggest tech companies, Satya Nadella made his final pit stop in Delhi. Over 100 Microsoft Students Programme members, startup entrepreneurs, met the Microsoft CEO, who talked about a range of issues – from cricket to various aspects of his professional journey. Earlier, during his trip to the Microsoft India headquarters in Hyderabad, Nadella had spoken at length about artificial intelligence (AI). At the Delhi event, he spoke about leadership skills and his love for cricket. The event also saw entrepreneurs like Vishal Gondal, founder CEO of fitness app GOQii, talking about their respective journeys. While Nadella's itinerary has been kept under the wraps, sources say that the Microsoft CEO plans to meet officials of the communications & information technology ministry, as well as the NITI Aayog and the Prime Minister’s Office during the final leg of his India visit. He leaves India for the US on Tuesday night. In Hit Refresh , Nadella delves into three key technologies that would lead to massive shifts in economy and society – mixed reality, artificial intelligence and quantum computing. These three currently independent threads would ultimately converge in future, with quantum computing making AI more intelligent and mixed reality becoming an even more immersive experience.   13:06 IST

thread.title: СК начал проверку по факту исчезновения 13-летней челябинки и ее 18-летнего друга
thread.title_full: СК начал проверку по факту исчезновения 13-летней челябинки и ее 18-летнего друга

posts.author: Служба новостей
posts.title: СК начал проверку по факту исчезновения 13-летней челябинки и ее 18-летнего друга
posts.text:
РОССИЯ ЕКАТЕРИНБУРГ ЧЕЛЯБИНСК КУРГАН ТЮМЕНЬ ЯНАО ХМАО РУБРИКИ https://www.znak.com/2017-11-07/sk_nachal_proverku_po_faktu_ischeznoveniya_13_letney_chelyabinki_i_ee_18_letnego_druga СК начал проверку по факту исчезновения 13-летней челябинки и ее 18-летнего друга 
Следственные органы начали доследственную проверку по факту безвестного исчезновения 13-летней девочки, которая днем 6 ноября 2017 года ушла из дома в Советском районе Челябинска вместе со своим 18-летним знакомым и до настоящего времени не вернулась. Как сообщает СУ СКР по региону, сейчас проводятся мероприятия по установлению обстоятельств исчезновения девочки и возможного ее местонахождения. По результатам проверки будет принято процессуальное решение. 
Напомним, по словам родителей девочки, школьница пропала утром 6 ноября. Она сообщила близким, что пошла гулять, но домой не вернулась, ее телефон отключен. Поисками пропавших занялась полиция. Кроме того, к розыскам подключились волонтеры. Пропавшие тинейджеры имеют положительные характеристики, ранее из дома не убегали.   Автор
